message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to make a deal. I'm offering it to you for $110.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

I understand that $90 is a good price for you, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $105. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. Would you be willing to consider $95?

I'm not willing to go up to $95 just yet. I'm willing to make another compromise and offer it to you for $102. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really get a lot of value out of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to make another compromise, but I'm still a bit above that price. Would you be willing to consider $98?
I'm not willing to go up to $98 just yet. I'm willing to make another compromise and offer it to you for $106. It's still a good deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to make another compromise, but I'm still trying to find a sweet spot. Would you be willing to consider $97?
I'm not willing to go up to $97 just yet. I'm willing to make another compromise and offer it to you for $104. It's still a good deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
This is my final offer. I'm willing to meet you at $96. If not, I'll have to consider other options.
